body_content.explanation: a period of time that is so long that it cannot be measured:
examples: Across the eons, religion has provided structure in human lives.
I've been waiting eons for my new computer.

body_content.explanation: a period of time of one thousand million years:
examples: Scientists guessed that this might be a volcanic rock that had remained unaltered for eons.

body_content.explanation: the longest period of time in which the history of the earth is measured, which can be divided into eras:
examples: The first eon was the Hadean, starting with the formation of the Earth and lasting over 600 million years until the Archean eon.
